infos.value: Hard Quests are the main means of acquiring Unit Shards that are necessary for awakening and Limit Breaking.
Hard Quests are the main means of collecting shards.
In order to attempt a Hard Quest, you must have acquired the applicable units and met the specified conditions.
Please view the areas on the World Quests screen for more detailed information.

As the name suggests, Hard Quests contain nothing but formidable enemies. Though there are many spoils to acquire, it is recommended that you attempt these quests only once your units' combined fighting power is sufficient.
Please be careful when attempting other Hard Quests...
Each Hard Quest offers specific <color=#00ffff>Unit Shards</color> as a reward.
Hard Quests are <color=#00ffff>unlocked</color> once all <color=#00ffff>relevant units</color> have been <color=#00ffff>acquired</color>.
Hard Quests have a fixed <color=#00ffff>number of times</color> that you can play <color=#00ffff>per day</color>.
